item.title: Is there a ... read please
item.dc:creator: @x0_0wn x0 0wn
item.description:
@x0_0wn wrote:

My friend O M G made one.
It also explains how to code the link is: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,89121.0.html

Or a simple explainer:
Download a source. ( Pimpscape recommended )
Compress it. ( Need winzip or another unzipping program )
Make a new network in hamachi
Advertise.
Run server ( can be found in the source folder, you may also need to unblock )
And code/ have fun.

  • x0 0wn, a newbie, helping newbies! ^^ -

Read full topic
